I can tell you right now before watching the best way to roast a marshmallow perfectly is to wait for the fire to die down so there's a lot of hot embers. Get you mallow pretty close to the embers, make sure it stuck on the stick with the flat side so the curved part is facing the embers. Now you have to constantly rotate and rotate pretty fast, and if you do this right you'll get perfectly golden roasted marshmallows in a little over 30s every time.
